All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminConsole
    AdminConsole - The console displayed when the user logged in is an Admin.
    Answer
    Answer - Answer given by user to quiz questions.
    Configuration
    Singleton of configuration get the properties of the database from a config.properties file.
    Console
    The main console launches when the quiz manager is first launched
    DAO<T>
    DAO - An abstract class of DAO that describes the behavior of DAOs to create.
    DBConnection
    DBConnection - A singleton that connects to the database.
    Evaluation
    Evaluation - Sets a quiz for a user, calculate their grade and exports the quiz and the user answers in a pdf.
    MCQAnswer
    MCQAnswer - User answer to questions of type MCQ.
    MCQChoice
    MCQChoice - A choice of an MCQ questions.
    MCQQuestion
    MCQQuestion - Question of type MCQ.
    MCQQuestionDAO  
    OpenAnswer
    MCQAnswer - User answer to Open questions.
    OpenQuestion
    OpenQuestion - Question of type Open
    OpenQuestionDAO
    OpenQuestionDAO - DAO to manipulate OpenQuestions.
    Question
    Question - Generalized type of a quiz question.
    QuestionType
    QuestionType - Enum of the possible types of a quiz question.
    Quiz
    Quiz - Generates a quiz with MCQ and Open questions based on a set of topics.
    QuizTests
    Tests implemented functions of the quiz manager.
    Session
    Session - Authentificates a user.
    StudentConsole
    StudentConsole - The console displayed when the user logged in is a student.
    Topic
    Topic - Topic of a question.
    User
    Represents a user which can be an Admin or a student.
    UserDAO
    UserDAO - DAO to manipulate Users.
